thread.title: TOM HILL
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by TOM HILL

author: TOM HILL
title: TOM HILL
text: After I placed my order, I believe on Dec 29th, I broke my ankle and didn't check my emails for about 3 days. When I did check, discovered my order had been canceled. (No one seems to know why). I replaced the order VIA phone and was promised shipment by UPS on Monday the 9th. Didn't receive the shipment until Friday the 13th, by regular mail and not UPS
